author: The Current
description:
Kathleen Edwards talks about her soundtrack work on "Lilith Fair: Building a Mystery"
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube or hit the Thanks button

In an interview with The Current's Jill Riley, Canadian singer-songwriter Kathleen Edwards describes how she first got involved in Lilith Fair and how a full-circle life moment led her to being the soundtrack composer for "Lilith Fair: Building a Mystery," the documentary from filmmaker Ally Pankiw and produced by Dan Levy ("Schitt's Creek") and Christina Piovesan.

title: Kathleen Edwards describes how she got involved in the Lilith Fair documentary soundtrack
